properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.gateway
properties.description: Which Payment Gateway will the gr1d Portal Billing use by default

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.endpoint
properties.description: The external URL where this service will be served

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.subscriptions.url
properties.description: The URL of the Subscriptions Service

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.subscriptions.authToken
properties.description: AuthToken to be sent to the Subscriptions Service

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.ca.url
properties.description: The URL of the CA API Portal where we will get the API Hits data

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.ca.clientId
properties.description: Our clientId at the CA API Portal

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.ca.clientSecret
properties.description: Our client secret at the CA API Portal

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.ca.accessTokenUrl
properties.description: The URL of the CA API Portal for generating access tokens

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.api.ca.scope
properties.description: The needed scopes at the CA API Portal

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.paging.defaultLimit
properties.description: The default number of items on a listing page

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.paging.maxLimit
properties.description: The maximum number of items on a listing page

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.charging.automaticCharge.statuses
properties.description: Which statuses are available to be charged automatically? (CSV, Default: CREATED)

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.charging.automaticCharge.batchSize
properties.description: How many bills are we processing in each step? (Default: 100)

properties.name: gr1d.portal.billing.charging.split.ownerRecipientId
properties.description: Payment Gateway Recipient ID for gr1d (sort of a default recipient for values)
